The Conservation Data Lab is a “ragtangle nature lovers and scientists hailing from an incredible diversity of backgrounds and skillsets, all here with the purpose of bettering ecosystems and ourselves” (Cassidy Downing, CDL alumni, 2020).

**Or put more officially:**

The Conservation Data Lab is a cohort of young professionals and students learning data-focused skills and tackling real-world conservation problems. Members  explore, map, summarize and present data while simultaneously building an amazing community.
